column1: Smoque BBQ////Be warned that Smoque is ALWAYS busy (understandable... great food) and there is often a wait (sometimes a line out the door!).  Service is good and quick
column2: but I always feel rushed because there are always people waiting for tables.  I've never been asked to move
column3: but I always feel eyed by staff members who want to clear the table for the next guest.  Again
column4: this is understandable since they have a constant flow of customers
column5: (and I do want to be considerate!) but like I said
column6: I always feel rushed. I don't think I've ever stayed seated there for more than 20 minutes.  Also
column8: it is always very LOUD and you may be seated literally elbow to elbow with someone.
